context: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm interested in finding a body swap type of movie. Something similar to Freaky Friday (2003) . Can you think of anything?
There is a movie called The Change-Up (2011) where two guys somehow switch bodies
I've never heard of that one. Sounds interesting! It could also be a movie where a person swaps roles but not bodies, like The Parent Trap (1998)
resp: Or The Hot Chick (2002) , sort of a funny version of how body swapping can go horribly wrong.
